titles.title: Hana no Zundamaru: Junk
花のずんだ丸 じゃんく

anime.description: Zundamaru is back... For now! Even without missions, we elite ninjas face grave dangers every day!

episode.title: 花のバレンタインはハートにずっきゅん
Flowering Valentine, You`ve Pierced My Heart
Hana no Valentine wa Heart ni Zukkyun
episode.summary: Tis the season for craving sweet and brown stuff! No sense waiting around for something I want, making the first move is the ninja way!

episode.title: 花のいつも見てるもんが気になることあるよな
Flowering Distracted All of a Sudden by That Thing I Always See, Happens Doesn`t It?
Hana no Itsumo Miteru Mon ga Ki ni Naru Koto Aru yo na
episode.summary: This time, I just can`t take my eyes off of that certain area of that one dude... Check it out? Are you kidding me, of course I will! Now, I wonder if it comes off...?

episode.title: 花の週末は手裏剣ちゃん
Flowering Weekends for Shuriken?
Hana no Shuumatsu wa Shuriken-chan
episode.summary: Being an elite ninja means training every day. This time I`ll be showcasing my prowess with shuriken! After all, I am the #1 shuriken thrower of all second-rate Iga ninjas! Alright, so what am I gonna hit today?
